cause.description:
for many many years single moms have been stripping to get money to feed their family. most of these lovely ladies, wher left by some dead beat slut of a man. who most likley couldnt handle being a man. but their are many other reasons for this. but i say way to shake that ass for cash girls! keep up te good work! but they need our help. you wouldnt beleive wat some of these strippin single moms will do for that little extra ;).
1. single moms must keep stripping!
2. they must get more money!!
3. they must be naked!!!
cause.mission: gettin them strippin single moms more money.
cause.name: single moms
